column4: hi, um.... how do I change the settings in gnome so that the active window is the one the mouse is over?  (like the olds days)
can I go into the source code?
You can edit it, that is what Free Software is al about
the whole OS is a little misleading. Do you want to look at kernel source or for a particular package?
sorry... I am not entirely sure... I just thought it would be cool to take a look
rm is remove -r means recursive, -f means force. / means from the root directory :-)
would that actually remove my root directory?  that doesn't sound like it should be possible
That would pretty much remove everything on your diesk
